RecordsetFilterCriteriaRule.name: RecordsetFilterCriteriaRule
RecordsetFilterCriteriaRule.description: Represents a rule using fields from the designated source object to create filters on the filtered, or target, object.

CriteriaField.description: The field the filter rule is applied to. Asset fields are available in API version 52.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the recordset filter criteria rule was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the recordset filter criteria rule was last viewed.

NextOccurence.description: This field’s value is compared to the Usage Field to determine if the rule is true.

Operator.description: The relational operator between CriteriaField and Value. Available in API version 52.0 or later.

RecordsetFilterCriteriaId.description: The ID of the RecordsetFilterCriteria record to associate this rule with.

RecordsetFilterCriteriaRuleNumber.description: The automatically assigned number of the recordset filter criteria rule.

Type.description: The type of criteria rule. Possible values are: Criteria—Default Usage UsageCounter— Usage(Counter) UsageDuration— Usage(Duration)

Value.description: The expected value of CriteriaField applied to the filter rule.

Usage Rate Field.description: Stores the daily usage rate of the asset. The unit for the usage rate must be per day. Possible values are derived from the source object’s standard and custom fields. Possible standard source objects are Asset and ServiceAppointment. The format is, for example, Asset.PricingSource or ServiceAppointment.GroupAppointmentAccessType.

Usage Rate Unit.description: Defines the rate for Usage Rate Field.
